name: Shannon Mackey
offering: Content Marketing, Internet Marketing Expert, Landing Page Tools, Logo Design, Marketing Expert, Social Media Platforms, Website Design

jv_history.partner_name: Shannon Mackey - Founder of Marketly Digital - LinkedIn

what_you_do: HipCat Society provides a marketing platform and coaching for non-marketers to help them set up a strategy, choose the right tactics, and get into momentum to spread their message and gain raving fans.
seeking: Action-driven and mission-focused coaches, speakers, consultants, or service providers as Founding Members
business_focus: Helping coaches, consultants, and service providers set up marketing automation, reliable systems, and get expert coaching to attract their dream clients.
service_provided: Marketing automation, strategy roadmaps, results blueprints, optimized templates and automations, 1:1 and group coaching
